altername_name: Alundra 2: Der Beginn einer neuen Legende
Alundra 2: Der Beginn einer neuen Legende
name: Alundra 2: A New Legend Begins
overview: You are Flint, a renegade swordsman on a quest to free a kingdom from the grip of a sinister ruler. Through a land of hidden danger you wield your weapon, navigating an intricate story wrought with bizarre characters, brain-twisting puzzles and wild games. Beware! An even greater evil is about to be revealed...
